DataElement.preferredName: Patient Other Anesthetic Agent Use Training and Education Assessment Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._(an-es-THET-iks) Substances that cause loss of feeling or awareness. Local anesthetics cause loss of feeling in a part of the body. General anesthetics put the person to sleep._Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose._To teach theory and hands on experience_the free text field to specify the assessment performed.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Other Anesthetic Agent Use Training and Education
Property.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:(an-es-THET-iks) Substances that cause loss of feeling or awareness. Local anesthetics cause loss of feeling in a part of the body. General anesthetics put the person to sleep.:Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.:To teach theory and hands on experience

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
A pharmacological agent that acts in a reversible fashion and can be applied either locally or systemically to cause a partial or total loss of sensation and pain or to induce unconsciousness.
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.
To teach theory and hands on experience

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field to specify the assessment performed.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.
